Description.Text: AComfotel is a budget hotel located at the heart of the vibrant West London. This hotel enjoys a superb location and offers contemporary rooms. Comfotel is conveniently situated a short walk away from Hammersmith HMV Apollo, Shepherds bush theatres, Westfield Shopping Centre and Kensington Olympia.
One can also take the metro to easily access interesting places such as London West End, Knightsbridge, Oxford Street and all central sites.

STANDARD - DOUBLE - The staff have been trained to offer and professional, courteous and friendly service to both national and international visitors. Should you require any assistance during your stay, including tourism advice, please consult the ever-present and energetic assistants.
Light, spacious and airy these rooms will be the ideal base for both business and leisure travellers to enjoy all that London has to offer. Comfotel boasts 16 elegant guestrooms. These rooms are decorated in a contemporary style. They are equipped with a range of modern comforts and furnished with functional features.
In the morning, guests can enjoy a hearty breakfast which is included in the room rate.
